results.name: B0X: The existentialist box mover robot

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 или Intel Core i5-4690K
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics or Intel Iris Xe Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 или Intel Core i5-4690K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics or Intel Iris Xe Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
